section.title: Events
section.para: &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor may fire any SLEE Event Type, upon request by JDBC Tasks, yet it includes two types on its own.

table.title: Event Types deployed by &THIS.RA; Resource Adaptor

row.entry: org.mobicents. slee.resource. jdbc.event. Jdbc Task Execution Throwable Event
Provides the exception or error which was thrown in a unsuccessful task execution.
org.mobicents. slee.resource. jdbc.event. Simple Jdbc Task Result Event
Default event type which results from task execution. This event type is used for tasks extending the abstract SimpleJdbcTask.

important.para: Spaces where introduced in the Name and Event Class column values, to correctly render the table. Please remove them when using copy/paste.
